mapper.select: select count(sc.grade) as value2, count((case when grade>=60 then 1 end) ) AS value1 , sum(c.score) as credit from sc,c where sno=#{sno} and c.cno=sc.cno and grade is not null
select sc.cno,c.cname, c.tname, sc.grade,c.score from sc,c where sc.cno=c.cno and sc.sno=#{sno} and sc.grade is not null ORDER BY c.score asc limit #{beginsize},#{endsize}
